data.title: Intercompany Management
data.meta_description: Transform your business with Prophix corporate performance management software for budgeting, forecasting, planning, and reporting.
data.text:
Evolve your intercompany reconciliations by empowering subsidiaries to carry out transaction-level matching and issue resolution across intercompany sales and purchases. Prophix One Intercompany Management makes it easy for entities to reconcile their part of global transactions and to resolve issues independently, all while you maintain oversight and control over the process. Eliminate the need for an intermediary, such as a group accountant, and enhance governance and financial insight within your financial consolidations process, driving financial accuracy and operational efficiency at your company

Eliminate manual data collection hassles and errors involving multi-entities and multi-currencies by seamlessly integrating disparate data sources into Prophix One and automatically structuring the data to elevate your financial accuracy and operational efficiency. By automating data imports and using intelligent data mapping with built-in validation rules, Prophix One ensures a smooth and reliable data collection process. Say goodbye to wasted time collecting and formatting data â€“ Prophix One Intercompany Management streamlines the entire process without the need for constant IT involvement to ensure accuracy in your intercompany transactions.

Intercompany reconciliation software is a specialized type of enterprise resource planning software designed to streamline and automate financial transactions and operations between entities within a single corporate group. Intercompany reconciliation software helps manage and reconcile intercompany transactions, ensuring compliance with accounting standards and reducing the risk of errors and discrepancies.

Intercompany reconciliations relate to the accounting activity between the subsidiaries of a corporation that owns more than one company. Intercompany reconciliation verifies the transactions that occur between these legal entities for accuracy. Account reconciliation is the reconciling of an account balance to a specific data source. Prophix One Intercompany Management is an intercompany reconciliation software that empowers subsidiaries in their transaction matching and issue resolution with its native data integration capabilities and robust dashboarding and audit reports that keeps everyone on track and accountable.

Intercompany reconciliation software can automate the financial close process by providing a robust way to track close progress and allow users to intuitively match and verify transactions, all while integrating data from disparate source systems, ensuring all intercompany data is captured. Prophix One Intercompany Management automates the close process in several ways. Users can automate elimination entries and manage them easily at both local and global levels. Data imports and rule validations ensure data accuracy and reliability. Automated currency conversions provide a clear view of intercompany activity across all subsidiaries.
